statements: SELECT id, food_product_name, carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE carbon_footprint >= 100.50;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE production_method = 'organic' ORDER BY food_product_name ASC;
SELECT id, food_product_name, carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE production_method = 'sustainable' ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT food_product_name, carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE carbon_footprint < 50.00;
SELECT id, ingredients, production_method FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE ingredients LIKE '%sugar%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE carbon_footprint > 100
SELECT id, food_product_name, carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE production_method LIKE '%organic%'
SELECT food_product_name, SUM(carbon_footprint) AS total_carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations GROUP BY food_product_name
SELECT AVG(carbon_footprint) AS average_carbon_footprint, MAX(carbon_footprint) AS max_carbon_footprint FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 50 AND 150
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT name, carbon_footprint FROM Ingredients WHERE carbon_footprint > 5;
SELECT id, name FROM Ingredients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE id = 3;
SELECT method_name, carbon_emission_rate FROM ProductionMethods;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE carbon_footprint > 5
SELECT name, carbon_footprint FROM Ingredients ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT name, method_name FROM Ingredients JOIN ProductionMethods ON Ingredients.id = ProductionMethods.id
SELECT * FROM ProductionMethods WHERE carbon_emission_rate < 2
SELECT name, carbon_footprint, method_name, carbon_emission_rate FROM Ingredients JOIN ProductionMethods ON Ingredients.id = ProductionMethods.id
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT name, carbon_content FROM ingredients WHERE carbon_content > 5;
SELECT method_name FROM production_methods WHERE impact_factor < 3 ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM food_products WHERE ingredient_id = 3 OR method_id = 1;

SELECT product_name, carbon_content, impact_factor FROM food_products JOIN ingredients ON food_products.ingredient_id = ingredients.id JOIN production_methods ON food_products.method_id = production_methods.id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY carbon_content DESC;
SELECT product_name, method_name FROM food_products INNER JOIN production_methods ON food_products.method_id = production_methods.id;
SELECT product_name, impact_factor FROM food_products INNER JOIN production_methods ON food_products.method_id = production_methods.id WHERE impact_factor > 5 ORDER BY impact_factor DESC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_content) AS avg_carbon_content FROM ingredients;
SELECT product_name, carbon_content FROM food_products INNER JOIN ingredients ON food_products.ingredient_id = ingredients.id WHERE carbon_content < 5 ORDER BY carbon_content ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_products;
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint FROM food_products;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM production_methods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, i.ingredient_name FROM food_products p JOIN product_ingredients pi ON p.id = pi.product_id JOIN ingredients i ON i.id = pi.ingredient_id;
SELECT id, product_name, carbon_footprint FROM food_products;
SELECT ingredient_name, ingredient_type FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT method_description FROM production_methods WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_ingredients WHERE product_id = 5;

SELECT product_name, ingredient_name FROM food_products JOIN product_ingredients ON food_products.id = product_ingredients.product_id JOIN ingredients ON product_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.id;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT id, name FROM production_methods ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT name, carbon_emission FROM ingredients WHERE carbon_emission > 0;
SELECT * FROM food_products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, method_name, efficiency FROM production_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, carbon_emission FROM ingredients WHERE carbon_emission > 0.5;
SELECT food_id, carbon_output FROM carbon_footprint JOIN food_products ON carbon_footprint.food_id = food_products.id WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT u.username, f.name, cf.carbon_output FROM users u JOIN food_products f ON u.id = f.id JOIN carbon_footprint cf ON f.id = cf.food_id;
SELECT f.name, p.method_name FROM food_products f JOIN production_methods p ON f.method_id = p.id WHERE f.quantity > 50;
